accessGrantsLocationArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 Access Grants location.

accessGrantsLocationId.description: Unique ID of the S3 Access Grants location.

iamRoleArn.description:
The ARN of the IAM role that S3 Access Grants should use when fulfilling runtime access
requests to the location.

locationScope.description: The default S3 URI `s3://` or the URI to a custom location, a specific bucket or prefix.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering AccessGrantsLocation resources.
